comments.comments_text: Weston McKennie (Schalke) makes a bad challenge and receives a yellow card. The referee had no doubt.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) makes a bad challenge and receives a yellow card. The referee had no doubt.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball low inside the left post. It's 1:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball low inside the left post. It's 1:0.

comments.comments_text: OWN GOAL! The free kick is whipped in and the ball hits Benjamin Stambouli (Schalke), who finds the back of his own net. 2:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: OWN GOAL! The free kick is whipped in and the ball hits [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who finds the back of his own net. 2:0.

comments.comments_text: The resulting set piece from Schalke is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting set piece from [TEAM] is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang hands Mario Gotze (Dortmund) the simplest of tasks from close range after the cross evaded the keeper, and he makes no mistake with his header into the middle of the goal. 3:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] hands [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) the simplest of tasks from close range after the cross evaded the keeper, and he makes no mistake with his header into the middle of the goal. 3:0.

comments.comments_text: Tempers flare after Thilo Kehrer (Schalke) commits a foul. He receives a yellow card for his bad challenge and surely must be relieved at not receiving a red card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Tempers flare after [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) commits a foul. He receives a yellow card for his bad challenge and surely must be relieved at not receiving a red card.

comments.comments_text: What a hit! Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) shows good composure inside the box to fire a first-time shot inside the right post. 4:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: What a hit! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) shows good composure inside the box to fire a first-time shot inside the right post. 4:0.

comments.comments_text: Bastian Oczipka (Schalke) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.

comments.comments_text: Here is a change. Franco Di Santo is going off and Domenico Tedesco gives the last tactical orders to Leon Goretzka (Schalke).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Here is a change. [PLAYER] is going off and [PLAYER] gives the last tactical orders to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Amine Harit (Schalke) is coming onto the pitch as Weston McKennie cannot continue after picking up an injury.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is coming onto the pitch as [PLAYER] cannot continue after picking up an injury.

comments.comments_text: The referee cannot ignore such behaviour. Daniel Caligiuri (Schalke) sees a yellow card and needs to watch himself for the rest of the game.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee cannot ignore such behaviour. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) sees a yellow card and needs to watch himself for the rest of the game.

comments.comments_text: There will be a change on the pitch for the second half. Domenico Tedesco probably wasn't satisfied with the performance of Thilo Kehrer. He is replaced by Matija Nastasic (Schalke).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: There will be a change on the pitch for the second half. [PLAYER] probably wasn't satisfied with the performance of [PLAYER]. He is replaced by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: The corner from Bastian Oczipka (Schalke) is hurriedly cleared.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is hurriedly cleared.

comments.comments_text: Sokratis (Dortmund) will have to be careful for the rest of the match as he is shown a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) will have to be careful for the rest of the match as he is shown a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) is shown a yellow card by the referee for making a challenge on his opponent, but he looks angry with the decision.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is shown a yellow card by the referee for making a challenge on his opponent, but he looks angry with the decision.

comments.comments_text: Nuri Sahin (Dortmund) works the corner short.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) works the corner short.

comments.comments_text: Mario Gotze (Dortmund) launches a cross from the corner, but Ralf Fahrmann is alert to thwart the effort.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) launches a cross from the corner, but [PLAYER] is alert to thwart the effort.

comments.comments_text: What a sweet header! Guido Burgstaller (Schalke) leaps high to connect with a cross on the edge of the box and scores with a trademark header.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: What a sweet header! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) leaps high to connect with a cross on the edge of the box and scores with a trademark header.

comments.comments_text: Amine Harit (Schalke) meets a perfect cross from Evgen Konoplyanka deep inside the box and controls it with a nice first touch. He produces an accurate strike inside the right post. The score is 4:2.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) meets a perfect cross from [PLAYER] deep inside the box and controls it with a nice first touch. He produces an accurate strike inside the right post. The score is 4:2.

comments.comments_text: Marc Bartra (Dortmund) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Andriy Yarmolenko.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) joins the action as a substitute, replacing [PLAYER].

comments.comments_text: RED CARD! Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) makes a bad challenge and receives a second yellow card from Deniz Aytekin. He can have an early bath.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: RED CARD! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) makes a bad challenge and receives a second yellow card from [REFEREE]. He can have an early bath.

comments.comments_text: Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) takes the resulting corner which is well defended.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the resulting corner which is well defended.

comments.comments_text: Mario Gotze just cannot continue due to injury and has to be substituted. Gonzalo Castro (Dortmund) replaces him.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] just cannot continue due to injury and has to be substituted. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) replaces him.

comments.comments_text: Evgen Konoplyanka (Schalke) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.

comments.comments_text: Gonzalo Castro (Dortmund) has tested the patience of referee Deniz Aytekin and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) has tested the patience of referee [REFEREE] and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

comments.comments_text: We are about to witness a substitution. Dan-Axel Zagadou (Dortmund) is replacing Raphael Guerreiro.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: We are about to witness a substitution. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is replacing [PLAYER].

comments.comments_text: An amazing individual effort from Daniel Caligiuri (Schalke) ends with a strike from inside the penalty area. He sends the ball precisely into the top left corner and makes it 4:3. Roman Weidenfeller was helpless.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: An amazing individual effort from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) ends with a strike from inside the penalty area. He sends the ball precisely into the top left corner and makes it 4:3. [PLAYER] was helpless.

comments.comments_text: Tempers flare after a clattering challenge by Evgen Konoplyanka (Schalke), who receives a yellow card from the referee. It could have been worse for him!
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Tempers flare after a clattering challenge by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who receives a yellow card from the referee. It could have been worse for him!

comments.comments_text: Evgen Konoplyanka (Schalke) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will swing the ball into the penalty box.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will swing the ball into the penalty box.

comments.comments_text: The score has changed – 4:4. Evgen Konoplyanka sends a fantastic cross into the box from the corner. Naldo (Schalke) jumps highest and plants a header into the top of the net.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The score has changed – 4:4. [PLAYER] sends a fantastic cross into the box from the corner. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) jumps highest and plants a header into the top of the net.

comments.comments_text: Although Nuri Sahin (Dortmund) is just on the bench, Deniz Aytekin has awarded him with a yellow card. Unsporting behavior says the referee.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Although [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is just on the bench, [REFEREE] has awarded him with a yellow card. Unsporting behavior says the referee.

comments.comments_text: Ralf Fahrmann (Schalke) gets a yellow card after the final whistle for unsporting behaviour.
